Download Sugar Stick Creator

Hi ,

We'll contact you to help you get started with Sugar on a Stick and to fix any issues that may arise. We may also contact you for your opinion so we can improve Sugar.

To run Sugar Stick Creator, simply run the shell script. The script supports Fedora based distros as well as Ubuntu. Alternativly, you can download the source from Github.

Download for Linux without help getting started.
